name: run_cell
description: 1 = Run Grid Cell, 0 = Do Not Run. Must be zero for all grid cells outside of the mask defined in the domain netCDF file.

name: gridcel
description: Grid cell number

name: lat
description: Latitude of grid cell

name: lon
description: Longitude of grid cell

name: infilt
description: Variable infiltration curve parameter (binfilt)

name: Ds
description: Fraction of Dsmax where non-linear baseflow begins

name: Dsmax
description: Maximum velocity of baseflow

name: Ws
description: Fraction of maximum soil moisture where non-linear baseflow occurs

name: c
description: Exponent used in baseflow curve, normally set to 2

name: expt
description: Exponent n in Campbells eqn for hydraulic conductivity HBH 5.6 (where lambda = soil pore size distribution parameter). Values should be above 3.

name: Ksat
description: Saturated hydrologic conductivity

name: phi_s
description: Soil moisture diffusion parameter

name: init_moist
description: Initial layer moisture content

name: elev
description: Average elevation of grid cell

name: depth
description: Thickness of each soil moisture layer

name: avg_T
description: Average soil temperature, used as the bottom boundary for soil heat flux solutions

name: dp
description: Soil thermal damping depth (depth at which soil temperature remains constant through the year, ~4 m)

name: bubble
description: Bubbling pressure of soil. Values should be >0.

name: quartz
description: Quartz content of soil

name: bulk_density
description: Bulk density of soil layer

name: soil_density
description: Soil particle density, normally 2685 kg/m3

name: organic
description: Fraction of soil layer that is organic. If ORGANIC_FRACT is TRUE in the global parameter file, this variable must be included in the soil parameter file. If ORGANIC_FRACT is FALSE then this variable must not appear in the soil parameter file. (release 4.1.2 and later)

name: bulk_dens_org
description: Bulk density of organic portion of soil. If ORGANIC_FRACT is TRUE in the global parameter file, this variable must be included in the soil parameter file. If ORGANIC_FRACT is FALSE then this variable must not appear in the soil parameter file. (release 4.1.2 and later)

name: soil_dens_org
description: Soil particle density of organic portion of soil, normally 1300 kg/m3. If ORGANIC_FRACT is TRUE in the global parameter file, this variable must be included in the soil parameter file. If ORGANIC_FRACT is FALSE then this variable must not appear in the soil parameter file. (release 4.1.2 and later)

name: off_gmt
description: Time zone offset from GMT. This parameter determines how VIC interprets sub-daily time steps relative to the model start date and time.

name: Wcr_fract
description: Fractional soil moisture content at the critical point (~70% of field capacity) (fraction of maximum moisture)

name: Wpwp_FRACT
description: Fractional soil moisture content at the wilting point (fraction of maximum moisture)

name: rough
description: Surface roughness of bare soil

name: snow_rough
description: Surface roughness of snowpack

name: annual_prec
description: Average annual precipitation

name: resid_moist
description: Soil moisture layer residual moisture

name: fs_active
description: If set to 1 then frozen soil algorithm is activated for the grid cell. A 0 indicates that frozen soils are not computed even if soil temperatures fall below 0C.

name: frost_slope
description: Slope of uniform distribution of soil temperature (if SPATIAL_FROST == TRUE in the global parameter file).

name: max_snow_distrib_slope
description: Maximum slope of the snow depth distribution. This is only used if SPATIAL_SNOW == TRUE in the global parameter file. This parameter should be set to twice the spatial average snow depth at which coverage == 1.0. In other words, if we define depth_thresh to be the minimum spatial average snow depth below which coverage < 1.0, then max_snow_distrib_slope = 2depth_thresh. NOTE*: Partial snow coverage is only computed when the snow pack has started melting and thespatial average snow pack depth <= max_snow_distrib_slope/2. During the accumulation season, coverage is 1.0. Even after the pack has started melting anddepth <= max_snow_distrib_slope/2, new snowfall resets coverage to 1.0, and the previous partial coverage is stored. Coverage remains at 1.0 until the new snow has melted away, at which point the previous partial coverage is recovered.

name: July_Tavg
description: Average July air temperature, used for treeline computations (required if COMPUTE_TREELINE == TRUE in the global parameter file).

name: Nveg
description: Number of vegetation tiles in the grid cell

name: veg_class
description: Vegetation class identification number

name: Cv
description: Fraction of grid cell covered by vegetation tile

name: root_depth
description: Root zone thickness (sum of depths is total depth of root penetration)

name: root_fract
description: Fraction of root in the current root zone.

name: sigma_slope
description: Standard deviation of terrain slopes within vegetation tile

name: lag_one
description: Lag-one autocorrelation of terrain slope within vegetation tile

name: fetch
description: Average fetch (distance the wind blows without obstructions) within vegetation tile

name: LAI
description: Leaf Area Index, one per month

name: fcanopy
description: Partial vegetation cover fraction, one per month

name: albedo
description: Albedo, one per month

name: overstory
description: Flag to indicate whether or not the current vegetation type has an overstory (TRUE for overstory present [e.g. trees], FALSE for overstory not present [e.g. grass])

name: rarc
description: Architectural resistance of vegetation type (~2 s/m)

name: rmin
description: Minimum stomatal resistance of vegetation type (~100 s/m)

name: rough
description: Vegetation roughness length (typically 0.123 * vegetation height)

name: displacement
description: Vegetation displacement height (typically 0.67 * vegetation height)

name: wind_h
description: Height at which wind speed is measured.

name: RGL
description: Minimum incoming shortwave radiation at which there will be transpiration. For trees this is about 30 W/m2, for crops about 100 W/m2.

name: rad_atten
description: Radiation attenuation factor. Normally set to 0.5, though may need to be adjusted for high latitudes.

name: wind_atten
description: Wind speed attenuation through the overstory. The default value has been 0.5.

name: trunk_ratio
description: Ratio of total tree height that is trunk (no branches). The default value has been 0.2.

name: AreaFract
description: Fraction of grid cell covered by each elevation band. Sum of the fractions must equal 1.

name: elevation
description: Mean (or median) elevation of elevation band. This is used to compute the change in air temperature from the grid cell mean elevation.

name: Pfactor
description: Fraction of cell precipitation that falls on each elevation band. Total must equal 1. To ignore effects of elevation on precipitation, set these fractions equal to the area fractions.
